glsa.title: rssh: Access restriction bypass
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in rssh, allowing local attackers to bypass access restrictions.

background.p: rssh is a restricted shell, allowing only a few commands like scp or sftp. It is often used as a complement to OpenSSH to provide limited access to users.

description.p: Multiple command line parsing and validation vulnerabilities have been discovered in rssh. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Multiple parsing and validation vulnerabilities can cause the restrictions set up by rssh to be bypassed.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All rssh users should upgrade to the latest version:
